t 

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] 
Posted At: Monday, November 20, 2006 4:56 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [EV1-C1880266I] DMCA Notice
Subject: [EV1-C1880266I] DMCA Notice


The attached PDF File is pasted below:

NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT
IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE DIGITAL MILLENNIUM COPYRIGHT ACT 1. This Notice of Copyright
Infringement is being submitted to the Internet Service Provider named herein
pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C. §512.
2. INTERNET SERVICE PROVIDER INFORMATION a. Name: Notwithstanding the requirements
contained in 17 U.S.C. § 512(c)(2)(A), this information is not provided on the
www.bargainshare.com website.
b. Alternative Names: d/b/a www.bargainshare.com c. Address: Notwithstanding the
requirements contained in 17 U.S.C. § 512(c)(2)(A), this information is not
provided on the www.bargainshare.com website.
3. DESIGNATED AGENT INFORMATION
a. Name: Notwithstanding the requirements contained in 17 U.S.C. § 512(c)(2)(A),
this information is not provided on the www.bargainshare.com website.
b. Address: Notwithstanding the requirements contained in 17 U.S.C. § 512(c)(2)(A),
this information is not provided on the www.bargainshare.com website.
c. Telephone: Notwithstanding the requirements contained in 17 U.S.C. §
512(c)(2)(A), this information is not provided on the www.bargainshare.com website.
d. Fax: Notwithstanding the requirements contained in 17 U.S.C. § 512(c)(2)(A),
this information is not provided on the www.bargainshare.com website.
e. E-mail: Notwithstanding the requirements contained in 17 U.S.C. § 512(c)(2)(A),
this information is not provided on the www.bargainshare.com website.
4. COMPLAINING PARTY’S INFORMATION
A. Complainant: Lowe’s Companies, Inc.
B. Complainant’s Authorized Representative a. Name: Heather Sidbury, Lowe’s
Companies, Inc.
b. Address: 1000 Lowe’s Boulevard, Mail Code LGMO, Mooresville, NC 28117 c.
Telephone: (704) 758-2862 d. Fax: (704) 757-0597 e. E-mail:
heather.g.sidbury@lowes.com
1
5. DESCRIPTION AND LOCATION OF COPYRIGHTED WORKS CLAIMED TO HAVE BEEN INFRINGED
Lowe’s Companies, Inc. owns text, graphics, and other authorship in its
advertisements, specifically its advertisement titled “Super Values Friday
Only!
